channel.title: How to make your website a IP for your server?
channel.description: Yeah so how do i do this? i seen a TUT somewhere but it got deleted :(

item.title: How to make your website a IP for your server?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

[quote=“booster, post:9, topic:293107”]if your talking about using your website url for ip for your server

for example
moparisthebest.com
server ip = moparisthebest.com
you can use no-ip.com for this but i pretty sure it costs money[/quote]

I still dont see why people ever advertise there IP’s
It just adds on to the chance of people DoS’ing your server
(and if you’re completely retarded and cant fix TPC), all-go-free’ing it.

Hide the IP within the client, allow client only to play.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make your website a IP for your server?

item.title: How to make your website a IP for your server?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:6, topic:293107”]The simple thing would be to : Never release your IP.

Noobs who use mopars Webclient, and Silab’s webclient shouldnt be allowed on your server.

Galkons Refactored / MITB Deob ftw. <33[/quote]

Mitb’s client is better than any galkon shit.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your website a IP for your server?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“boycie-tribey, post:3, topic:293107”]Do you mean like instead of _____.no-ip.biz you want ____.com?
You have to have a VPS and a good webhost.[/quote]No.

[quote=“12mil, post:4, topic:293107”]i mean… instead of using blahscape.no-ip.biz
i want to be able to use www.whatever.com as a Ip instead of blahscape.no-ip.biz
how am i going to do that?[/quote]You have to pay for it.

Read full topic
